body:
- Fixed craters map not having any ores
- Fixed crash on setting wave spacing to 0
- Fixed unit selection in wave editor going off-screen
- Fixed editor crash
- Allowed placing of blocks in shallow water
- Allowed loading of maps with spaces by using underscores [Server]
- Increased large battery capacity, solar panel output
- Tougher default waves for custom maps
- Removed bridge autolinking to bridges that were not placed last
- Reduced drone factory silicon cost
- Slightly smaller desktop builds
name: v4 Build 66 - Beta
